name: Song Bird Slumber
description:
Song Bird Sanctuary Supplementary 1:

Song Bird Slumber

Explore the realm of your dreams. Your subconscious.

A quirky, introspective deck builder JRPG. Build your deck with attack and spell cards. Draw them on your turn, and watch your plan come to life.

This is a stand alone demo for a future game, Song Bird Sanctuary. More in this universe to come.

Made by @radian2pi.

System Requirements:

  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.

Basically you should be able to run it.
